content: skill level - beginner if you are a new crocheter this pattern is for you this would be a great first garment this pattern has been tested by two or more testers for each size i am currently working on additional sizes stitches single_crochet double_crochet chains picots stitch explanation and chart is included there is a construction diagram in this pattern hook 6 50 mm or hook needed to gauge gauge 12 sts x 6 row in double_crochet is 4 x4 yarn 780 810 840 910 940 1010 1070 yards of #4 worsted weight cotton or acrylic i always recommend to buy more just in case i have had one too many projects where i ended up needing just a bit more yarn sizes xs s m l xl 2x 3x the winnie hooded vest is worked in one piece using one simple seam to create the hood oh and don t forget the pockets the winnie has a simple yet classy edge that finishes it off just right this light and airy design is perfect for a trip to the beach or the pool add a button or toggle and use the over-sized hood to pull down and wrap around your shoulders it is also perfect for spring or fall over a cozy long sleeved shirt the fashion possibilities are endless with the winnie i can t wait to see your finished photos of the winnie hooded vest tag @life and yarn and use #lifeandyarn to be featured
